column4: ANyone know how to get a nice pie chart of the harddrive fre space?
i recall kde had some feature like tht in their file manager.. not sure of other similer tools however
yes you can. of course How its networked - is the next question. ya just run that gnome printer config tool and have at it. :p
the 'fuseiso' or 'fuseiso9660' tool can mount those I recall. or you can convert to iso. then mount it.. BUT dont expect game-copy protection to work.
